text: Illuminator may refer to: * A light source *Limner, an illustrator of manuscripts *Illuminator radar * The Illuminator, a political art collective based in New York City == People == *Gregory the Illuminator (250s–330s) * Euthymius the Illuminator (950s–1020s) * Saint Sava, known as Illuminator of the Serbs (1169–1235) == See also == * Illuminate (disambiguation) * Illuminated (disambiguation)
title: Illuminator
